name: UnifiedAttribute
description: A unified attribute for the Polygon Glowbox

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the glowbox
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the glowbox
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the glowbox
default: 0.0

content.name: points
content.description:
the points of a HyperPolygon
default: a default HyperPolygon

content.name: glow
content.description:
the colour of the glowbox when it is glowing
default: {r:0.95, g:0.91, b:0.55, a:1.0}

content.name: dim
content.description:
the colour of the glowbox when it is not glowing
default: {r:0.31, g:0.31, b:0.31, a:1.0}
